page.title: 09Royal Pump Rooms, Leamington
page.content: In 1491 John Rous,found the Spa waters which contains many minerals which is supposed to heal you.In 1814 the PUMP ROOMS were built over the springs to pump the water up from under the ground.Later on Queen Victoria visited the pump rooms so Leamington decided to call it the ROYAL PUMP ROOMS instead of just pump rooms. Nowadays the Pump Rooms are used to give physiotherapy and hydrotherapy to members of the public. Here the natural waters are used to provide healing. The water is no longer drunk voluntarily! There are controversial plans for the future of the Pump Rooms which are in a poor state of repair. These plans are aimed at the tourist side of Leamington and Warwick.
